name: Malum Mortis
description:
MALUM MORTIS is a metaplot for the Mork Borg campaign. 

Purchase includes: 

  •  MALUM MORTIS Pdf (hi- and low-resolution), includes the Drunkard class.
  • Soul-Damned Drunkard PDF (hi- and low-resolution).
  • Soul-Damned Drunkard Spreads PDF (hi- and low-resolution).
  • Graphics files for Tergol, relics, and Soul-Damned Drunkard class VTT token.

This PDF includes cover and table of contents art by Carlos Castilho. The relics were generated by DALL-E.

This product contains assets that were procedurally generated with the aid of creative software(s) powered by machine learning.
